1: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> אַל־ תַּ֭שְׁחֵת <sup>516 </sup> <n>Altaschith</n> לְדָוִ֣ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> מִכְתָּ֑ם <sup>4387 </sup> <n>Michtam</n> בְּבָרְח֥וֹ <sup>1272 </sup> <n>when he fled</n> מִפְּנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from</n> שָׁ֝א֗וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>Saul</n> בַּמְּעָרָֽה׃ <sup>4631 </sup> <n>in the cave</n> חָנֵּ֤נִי <sup>2603 </sup> <n>Be merciful</n> אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto me O God</n> חָנֵּ֗נִי <sup>2603 </sup> <n>be merciful</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בְךָ֮ חָסָ֪יָה <sup>2620 </sup> <n>trusteth</n> נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>unto me for my soul</n> וּבְצֵֽל־ <sup>6738 </sup> <n>in thee yea in the shadow</n> כְּנָפֶ֥יךָ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>of thy wings</n> אֶחְסֶ֑ה <sup>2620 </sup> <n>will I make my refuge</n> עַ֝֗ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> יַעֲבֹ֥ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>be overpast</n> הַוּֽוֹת׃ <sup>1942 </sup> <n>until [these] calamities</n>
2: אֶ֭קְרָא <sup>7121 </sup> <n>I will cry</n> לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>unto God</n> עֶלְי֑וֹן <sup>5945 </sup> <n>most high</n> לָ֝אֵ֗ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>unto God</n> גֹּמֵ֥ר <sup>1584 </sup> <n>that performeth</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
3: יִשְׁלַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He shall send</n> מִשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>from heaven</n> וְֽיוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <sup>3467 </sup> <n>and save</n> חֵרֵ֣ף <sup>2778 </sup> <n>me [from] the reproach</n> שֹׁאֲפִ֣י <sup>7602 </sup> <n>of him that would swallow me up</n> סֶ֑לָה <sup>5542 </sup> <n>Selah</n> יִשְׁלַ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>shall send forth</n> אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> חַסְדּ֥וֹ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>his mercy</n> וַאֲמִתּֽוֹ׃ <sup>571 </sup> <n>and his truth</n>
4: נַפְשִׁ֤י ׀ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>My soul</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>[is] among</n> לְבָאִם֮ <sup>3833 </sup> <n>lions</n> אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <sup>7901 </sup> <n>[and] I lie</n> לֹ֫הֲטִ֥ים <sup>3857 </sup> <n>[even among] them that are set on fire</n> בְּֽנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[even] the sons</n> אָדָ֗ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> שִׁ֭נֵּיהֶם <sup>8127 </sup> <n>whose teeth</n> חֲנִ֣ית <sup>2595 </sup> <n>[are] spears</n> וְחִצִּ֑ים <sup>2671 </sup> <n>and arrows</n> וּ֝לְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>and their tongue</n> חֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>sword</n> חַדָּֽה׃ <sup>2299 </sup> <n>a sharp</n>
5: ר֣וּמָה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>Be thou exalted</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>above the heavens</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[be] above all the earth</n> כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>[let] thy glory</n>
6: רֶ֤שֶׁת ׀ <sup>7568 </sup> <n>a net</n> הֵכִ֣ינוּ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>They have prepared</n> לִפְעָמַי֮ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>for my steps</n> כָּפַ֪ף <sup>3721 </sup> <n>is bowed down</n> נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> כָּר֣וּ <sup>3738 </sup> <n>they have digged</n> לְפָנַ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> שִׁיחָ֑ה <sup>7882 </sup> <n>a pit</n> נָפְל֖וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>whereof they are fallen</n> בְתוֹכָ֣הּ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>me into the midst</n> סֶֽלָה׃ <sup>5542 </sup> <n>[themselves] Selah</n>
7: נָ֘כ֤וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>is fixed</n> לִבִּ֣י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>My heart</n> אֱ֭לֹהִים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> נָכ֣וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>is fixed</n> לִבִּ֑י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> אָ֝שִׁ֗ירָה <sup>7891 </sup> <n>I will sing</n> וַאֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>and give praise</n>
8: ע֤וּרָה <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Awake up</n> כְבוֹדִ֗י <sup>3519 </sup> <n>my glory</n> ע֭וּרָֽה <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awake</n> הַנֵּ֥בֶל <sup>5035 </sup> <n>psaltery</n> וְכִנּ֗וֹר <sup>3658 </sup> <n>and harp</n> אָעִ֥ירָה <sup>5782 </sup> <n>I [myself] will awake</n> שָּֽׁחַר׃ <sup>7837 </sup> <n>early</n>
9: אוֹדְךָ֖ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> בָעַמִּ֥ים ׀ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>thee O Lord</n> אֲ֝זַמֶּרְךָ֗ <sup>2167 </sup> <n>I will sing</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>among</n> אֻמִּֽים׃ <sup>3816 </sup> <n>unto thee among the nations</n>
10: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גָדֹ֣ל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[is] great</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>unto the heavens</n> חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>For thy mercy</n> וְֽעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שְׁחָקִ֥ים <sup>7834 </sup> <n>unto the clouds</n> אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>571 </sup> <n>and thy truth</n>
11: ר֣וּמָה <sup>7311 </sup> <n>Be thou exalted</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>above the heavens</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> עַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>[be] above all the earth</n> כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>[let] thy glory</n>
